text: wadhkr - 'ayuha alrasul - yawm yaeadd alzaalim linafsih ealaa yadayh ndmana wthsrana qayla ya laytani sahbt rasul allah mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam watbeth fi aitikhadh al'islam tryqana 'iilaa aljnt, wythssar qayla ya laytani lam 'atakhidh alkafir flanana sdyqana 'atabieh wawdh. laqad adllany hdha alsadiq ean alquran baed 'iidh ja'ny. wakan alshaytan alrajim khadhulana lil'iinsan daymana. wafi hadhih alayat althdhyr min msahbt qarin alsw'; fa'iinah qad yakun sbbana li'iidkhal qarinuh alnar
